title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Standing man, dressed in green short skirt and scalloped blue coat, wearing black coolie hat; his left hand is raised, the right points downward. Chinoiserie type of decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Glazed, high fire decorated earthenware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-28.
